MFNRegion Class Reference
[MFNRegion]

A subset of N-space. More...

#include <MFNRegion.h>

Detailed Description

A subset of N-space.

An MFNRegion represents a subset of n-dimensional space. Given an MFNVector the MFNRegion provides a way of testing for "inside" and "outside". It is a base class, with constructors for some common regions.
